title: Macyâ€™s Plans to Invest Millions to Fund Minority-Owned Businesses
description: The department store chain is investing $30 million over five years to support entrepreneurs from underrepresented groups in the retail industry.
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: Robin Wilson, the founder of Clean Design Home, would like to expand her business into other categories, like mattresses, but estimated that she would need at least $1 million in financing.
